Reference

Symbology

These functions build cartographic layers.

mf_map()

Plot a map

mf_label()

Plot labels

mf_raster()

Plot a raster

Map Layout

These functions are dedicated to the map layout design.

mf_init()

Initialize a map with a specific extent

mf_theme()

Set a theme

mf_shadow()

Plot a shadow

mf_legend()

Plot a legend

mf_annotation()

Plot an annotation

mf_arrow()

Plot a north arrow

mf_credits()

Plot credits

mf_layout()

Plot a map layout

mf_title()

Plot a title

mf_scale()

Plot a scale bar

mf_inset_on() mf_inset_off()

Plot an inset

mf_worldmap()

Plot a point on a world map

Utility Functions

These functions are useful for some utility tasks.

mf_export()

Export a map

mf_get_links()

Get a link layer from a data.frame of links.

mf_get_pal()

Get color palettes

mf_get_breaks()

Get class intervals

mf_get_mtq()

Get the 'mtq' dataset
